feed.subtitle: Here you can the general publications I do regarding different subjects as devops or programming ðŸ™‚

entry.title: Interactive bookmarks menu v2
entry.summary: In this post, I am going to improve the interactive bookmark I created in a previous post.

entry.title: How to use a repository for importing your bash scripts and shortcuts
entry.summary: In this post, I will explain how to load custom variables by reading a JSON file, this will be done every time we open a Terminal. I will also improve the shortcuts we create in the previous posts.

entry.title: Load custom variables at Terminal startup
entry.summary: In this post, I will explain how to import custom environment variables from a JSON file.

entry.title: Add shortcuts to your bash terminal
entry.summary: In this post, I will define shortcuts in my bash terminal. The implementation is based on using aliases and functions. Super simple!

entry.title: Create an interactive bookmarks menu in your terminal
entry.summary: In this post, I am going to implement an interactive bookmarks menu using fzf in bash Terminal.

entry.title: How to use the PowerShell Profile to be more productive
entry.summary: In this post, I will explain how to set up shortcuts in the PowerShell Profile. Everything in this article works for PowerShell 5.1 and later.
